dataset.question: Hello
dataset.answer: Hi there! Welcome to Shadowhire, your AI-powered recruitment assistant. How can I help you today?

dataset.question: Hi
dataset.answer: Hello! I'm Shadowhire's chatbot. Ask me about job matching, resume analysis, or Tunisian tech opportunities.

dataset.question: What is Shadowhire?
dataset.answer: Shadowhire is an AI recruitment platform that matches candidates with jobs using NLP algorithms. It was founded by Aziz Mehdi in Tunisia and uses Angular/Django/Flask tech stack.

dataset.question: Who are you?
dataset.answer: I'm Shadowhire's AI assistant, here to help with job searches, resume optimization, and career advice - especially in Tunisia's tech sector.

dataset.question: How do I sign up?
dataset.answer: Click 'Register' on our homepage. You'll need: 1) Valid email 2) Password (8+ chars) 3) Basic profile info. Tunisian phone number optional.

dataset.question: Is Shadowhire free?
dataset.answer: Yes! Basic job matching is free. Premium features (advanced analytics, resume A/B testing) require subscription.

dataset.question: What file formats can I upload?
dataset.answer: We accept: PDF, DOCX (Max 10MB). For best results in Tunisia, include both French and English versions.

dataset.question: How does job matching work?
dataset.answer: Our AI analyzes: 1) Your skills 2) Experience 3) Education against job requirements using TF-IDF and transformer models.

dataset.question: What tech stack does Shadowhire use?
dataset.answer: Frontend: Angular 17 | Backend: Django 5 | AI: Flask + HuggingFace | Database: MySQL | DevOps: Docker/Jenkins/MLflow

dataset.question: How to reset password?
dataset.answer: Go to Login > Forgot Password. You'll receive a reset link valid for 2 hours (check spam folder).

dataset.question: Can recruiters see my resume?
dataset.answer: Only when: 1) You apply to their job 2) Your profile is set to 'Visible to recruiters' in Privacy settings.

dataset.question: How to delete account?
dataset.answer: Profile > Settings > Delete Account. Warning: This permanently erases all your data from our Tunisian servers.

dataset.question: What's the development roadmap?
dataset.answer: Current focus: 1) Arabic NLP improvements 2) Tunisian salary benchmarks 3) Integration with Tunisian social security system.

dataset.question: How accurate is the resume score?
dataset.answer: Our AI scores are 85-90% accurate for Tunisian market standards, based on comparison with 10,000+ successful hires.

dataset.question: Where is Shadowhire hosted?
dataset.answer: Primary servers: Tunisian Data Centers (Cynapsys) | Backup: Azure France | All data complies with Tunisian data protection laws.

dataset.question: How to contact support?
dataset.answer: Email: support@shadowhire.tn | Phone: +216 28 285 576 (9AM-5PM Tunis time) | Address: Tunis Cyberparks, El Ghazala.

dataset.question: Is there a mobile app?
dataset.answer: Not yet, but our PWA works on all devices. Native iOS/Android apps coming Q1 2025.

dataset.question: What's the difference between candidate/recruiter views?
dataset.answer: Candidates see: Jobs, Matches, Resume Tools. Recruiters see: Post Jobs, View Candidates, Analytics Dashboard.

dataset.question: How to report a bug?
dataset.answer: Use the 'Report Bug' button in Settings or email bugs@shadowhire.tn with screenshots and steps to reproduce.

dataset.question: Is my data secure?
dataset.answer: Yes! We use: 1) AES-256 encryption 2) Tunisian-hosted servers 3) Regular penetration testing by CERT-TUNISIA.

dataset.question: What's the max resume size?
dataset.answer: 10MB. For Tunisian jobs, we recommend 2-3 page resumes focusing on technical skills.

dataset.question: How to edit profile?
dataset.answer: Profile > Edit > Update fields. Note: Changing skills may affect your job matches within 24 hours.

dataset.question: Why can't I upload my resume?
dataset.answer: Common issues: 1) Wrong file format 2) Size >10MB 3) Corrupt file. Try exporting as new PDF from Word.

dataset.question: How do job recommendations work?
dataset.answer: AI ranks jobs based on: 1) Your skills 2) Tunisian market trends 3) Employer response rates 4) Salary benchmarks.

dataset.question: Can I apply directly?
dataset.answer: Yes! One-click applications using your Shadowhire profile. Some Tunisian companies may require additional forms.

dataset.question: What's the 'Resume Score'?
dataset.answer: A metric (1-100) evaluating: 1) Completeness 2) Keyword optimization 3) Formatting for Tunisian recruiters.

dataset.question: How to improve my resume score?
dataset.answer: 1) Add missing sections 2) Include Tunisian industry keywords 3) Quantify achievements 4) Use our AI feedback tool.

dataset.question: What's TF-IDF?
dataset.answer: Algorithm that weights words in your resume vs. job posts. Critical for Tunisian tech roles where specific skills (React, Django) are key.

dataset.question: How often are jobs updated?
dataset.answer: Every 15 minutes. Tunisian IT companies like STMicroelectronics often post new roles on Mondays.

dataset.question: Can I save jobs?
dataset.answer: Yes! Click the bookmark icon. Saved jobs stay for 90 days with activity notifications.

dataset.question: How to unsubscribe from emails?

dataset.question: What's the privacy policy?
